div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo septimo
die mensis Maij Anno Dominj millesimo quinquagesimo tercio

The said day Johne of myle at the myle of petrapile was accusit for strublance
of Issabele Scherar quhilk strublance / scho wald' nocht haue sustenit for fourty pundis
for the quhilkis the said Johnne' was in amerciament of the court be his avin tonge grant
and tile amend as law will ande forber in tyme tocum Ande atour the said Johne'
being oblist to stande at the ordinance of the alderman and Counsaill quhilk riplie
awisit with the witnes being present for the tyme deliurit ande ordanit the said Johnne'
to Sit downe in the court one his kneis ande aske the said Issabell fogiwnes Ande besek the
Aldirman and ballies to beseik hir to forgif him Ande to ger mak ane Candill of wax contening
ane punde and cum one sonday that nixt cumis in tyme of the hiemes in sanct nicholes
kirk and offir it to the hiealter and thar ask the said Issabele forgevnes oppinly befor
the personis beand present for the tyme sayande he wist neuire sic thingis one the said
Issabell as he said and reersit one hire quhilk candile' salbe offerit to the
haly blud licht

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo nono
die mensis Anno quosupra

The said day schir Johne ruthirfurd lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit
tile haue ansuerit to the borgh' strekit one him be gilbert menyeis for the wrang
wis' withhalding fra him of xxxv s' vj d' for ane elne and half ane quarter
of paris' rede and ane vnce of Sewin silk Tharfor the Alderman and ballies chargit
Androw nachtie officiare to pas' and tak ane stres' of the said sere Johnne' and
lat It to borgh' agane gif it be askit and warne him to ansuer to the saide
borgh' this day xv dais the secunde thrid day of June as Secunde day of proces'

The saide thomas lamyntoun' lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit tile
haue ansuerit to James hill for xiiij schillingis ande ane stane of taucht et cetera And
the baillies chargit Androw nachtie officiar to pas' ande tak ane stres of the said
thomas ande lat it borgh' agane gif It be askit and warne him to Comper
one monunday . that . nixt cumis to ansuer to the said' Copin as
the thrid' day of process'

The saide day It was deliuirit be ane Suorne assis' Johne leslie of
Warderis / forspekar' that patry chernside sall mak pament to Johne
Robertsone for xixxx and iiijor skinnis quhilkis he resauit and Intromettit
with of his Samekile as cane be Sufficientlie preuit that the said'
skinnis was sauld' for becaus' it was lauchfullie / prewit befor the
said' assis' that the said patry hed' Intromettit and resauit the saide skinis

The saide day It was deliuirit be ane Suorne assis' Johne leslie
of Warderis forspekar that Duncan crak sal Input the warstall' in
the butht quhilk he hed' in tak of sere Androw Colison' and put one the lok
of the dur' of the saide butht and deliuir him the key and the male of the
samyn at Witsonday nixt to Cum asl' gude as it was quhene he Intromettit
tharwith and that being done the said Duncan is quyt of al wrang

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij die
maij anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander Couplande of vthaw offerit redy tile vndirlie the
law befor the aldirman and balyeis of the saide burghe' In ale thingis that
thomas lammyntone hed to persew him protestand' gif he follouit him nocht
for Costis skathis expensis or euire he be herde In Jugement

The saide day It was deliuirit and ordanit be the aldirman and Counsale
present for the tyme that Alexander chamer and Johne chamer his Sone sale set
and fynde ane Sufficient merchandman dettour to sere Androw Coupar thar
seruitour that he is plesit of betuix this and Witsonday next to Cum
to pay him fiwe pundis or this next our Souerane lordis chaker'
Ande falyeing tharof thai will dispone apone thar tak of the Raik
malis quhar thai think mast expedient

Eodem die patricius chernside amerciatur per assiam Juratam ex ore Andree Cullane
prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis annande Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid mar Junior deuenit plegius legalis per manus dextere
onoracionem quod Johannes annande erit Indempnis pro patricio chernside Aliter quam per
viam Juris Et Andreas Stewinsone deuenit plegius legalis per manus dextere
onoracionem quod dictus patricius ore Indempnes pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per viam Juris
Et quilibet dictam parcium Obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione per manus dextere onoracionem

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die maij
anno quo Supra

The said' day the ballieis chargit patrik chernside to mak compt
rekning and pament to Johne robertsone of xixxx s' iiijor skinnis betuix
this and monunday next to Cum eftir the tenor of the deliuirance
of the assis' gevin tharupon' Obefor as the actis of the buk
proportis

Eodem die Dauid menyeis Alexander rede gilbertus menyeis
Johannes Colisone Andreas Cullane Alexander gray / matheus
branche Johannes Stewinsone patricius schernsid' Johannes
Duncansone Dauid fynne Willelmus Kintor Malcomus crag
Dauid Crukschank alias talyour et Johannes Kintor burgenses
dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Agnes mar mater
Arthurij Andirsone latorum presencium Obiit vltra vestita et
sasita de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Castri in le chakir raw inter terram
Sancti sabestian ex occidentali et communiones vias regias ex orientali et
boreali partibus et terram Alexandri mar' versus austrum Et quod dictus Arth
ur est legittime et propinquior heres dicte quondam Agentis matris sue
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet
nunc per annum iiijo marcis et valuit xl s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in
Capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium et cetera Et
nunc existit In manibus Johannis Andirson' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die maij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Scrogis conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
alexandri rede prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio domus Richardi Redhed'
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Scrogis conuictus fuit per asssiam Juratam ex ore Alexandri
Rede prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio mariote gathirgude sponse Richardi
redhed' Et dicta mariota conuicta fuit pro perturbio dicti Johannis
et quelibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Willelmus ranisone conuictus per dictam assisam pro
perturbio Willelmi baxtar Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid baxtar conuictus fuit per dictam assisam pro
iniuste detencione lapidium Sancti nicholaij patronum nostri

The saide day Williame Colp and Dauid Colp his sone
Oblist thame fathtfullie to warande keipe and defende
thomas ridale and cristiane lilurne his Spous' skathtles anent
the annuele rent of tene schillingis aving yerlie of the hous'
quhilkis thai Inhabit at the handis of the prior and conuent of the predicatoris
of Abirdene for the quhilkis the said cristiane Oblist hir fathtfullie to
pay to the saide Dauid the said annuele Rent of the termes bigane

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo octauo
die maij Anno quo supra

The said day comperit Williame Scrogis ande schew that Robert blak hade
fundin ane borgh' one him that he was his feit seruand to fische his wattir
quharfor the said William offerit him reddy to ansuer to the saide Williame
borgh' becaus the said Robert comperit nocht the said Williame protestit to be
quyt of his Chalange quhill he war new warnit

The said day comperit Willio lesly ande offerit him reddy tile ansuer
to the borgh' fundin one him be walter saiffray becaus the said wattir
was nocht pait to folloue him be protestit to be quyt of his Chalange vnto
the tyme he be warnit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem secundo die mensis Junij anno quo supra

head.add: malcome crag and the ayris of Westlandis

div.p:
The saide day malcome crag procurator for Jonet trale
offerit him redy to full ale thingis contenit in the decret
arbitraill gevin be the arbitoris chosin betuix hir and Dauy
talyour procurator to the ayris of vmquhile Johne Westlande
Ande to pay the Siluir that the Pott lyis in wed' of In
the nayme of sere Johne malysone to the saide Dauid Ande
James Kennarty grauntit he hede resauit for the saide malcum
one the saide sere Johnis' behalf the fyle of hale ane barrell
of Salmonde for the said' pot and ane fothirbede

The saide day thome Walcar grantit to pay to Duncane
gilrutht samekile as he happinnis to preiwe sufficently
that the Walcaris scheir' was skathtit be the saide thomas
and the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to the said Duncan
to preiwe the skath done to the saide scheir be the saide thomas

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd miles legittime vocatus respondetur plegio sibi eum per gilbertum menyis
porrectum pro iniuste detencione ab eo xxxv s' et vj d' non comparuit Igitur precipitur Andree
nachtj sergeando ad capiendum districtum ab eodem Johanne et eundem ad plegium et ipsi hodie ad
quindenam ?? ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam tercio die huius

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Johne annand' procurator and forspekar for
Johne Robertsone grantit him Content that patry chernsid' /
Cum befor the aldirman and baillieis one monunday cum viij
dais within the tolbutht in the hour' of caus' and with tua
leill mene in his handis and Sueir' the gret bodelie
aithe how mekile he gat for the Skinnis optenit
one him be the saide Johne hundretht hundreth lik and
pay the Samyn within terme of law and the said patry
was content of the Samyn and consentit tharto

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Junj Anno Domini et cetera

Eodem die Andreas Jhonsone amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
fynne prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio thome clerk in Torry Et Idem
thomas amerciatur pro perturbio dictj andree / Andreas gray aliis couplande amerciatur
per perturbio andree Jhonsone Et Idem andreas Jhonsone' pro perturbio dicti
andree couplande Andreas coupland pro perturbio thome Robertj henricj
Et Idem Robertus amerciatur pro perturbio dictj Andree Couplande Et vtraque
pars alterj emendabunt ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo die
mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said' day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that thomas Walcar' hed' Skathit the Walcaris schiris pertening to Duncan
gilrutht v s' quhilk the balyeis chargit the said' thome to pay
within terme of law

The said day the aldirman and balyeis chargit Elizibetht Cullane to
big and mak vp hir dikis and fynd nichtbourschip to sere Androw chamer
mastir of Sanct thomas chapell according to the Akis and statutis
maid' tharupon' consoning to Justice

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit and ordanit Sandy
crag to pay Richard' Waus the maile of the butht that
he occupeit and put one the lok of the dur' of hte samyn'
and falyeing he pait nocht the maile to claitht the grond' agan
with the gudis that was arrestit in the saide gudis butht

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and diuers' of the Counsale
ande Communite present for the tyme Consentit and grantit to
Williame futhes ane pece of wastlande liande one
the Est part of Sanct nicholes kirkyard mercheand' with
the lande that vmquhill Williame bull Inhabit to big
ane berne he payand' xij d' yerlie to the communite Ande
ordanit to mak him ane chartir tharupon' heritablie vndir thar
common' Sell

The said' day Comperit Alexnader Coupar with alexander red his forspekar
and askit at the aldirman and balyeis nichtbourschip to thar Justice
myllis Ande gif he gat nayn' he protestit that he sulde pay
nay maile and that he mycht haue priuilege to follow the tovne
for his costis and Skathis Ande gif that he Occupeit the haill
said' myllis in falt of nychtbourschip that he pay bot the half
maile and tharupon' he tuk Instrument befor Androw Cullan Richarde
Waus Johne Retre Johne Waus patry chernsid' sere Johne
Rede sere Androw chamer and sere Dauy leis patry Rede and Androw nachtj

The said day Androw Cullane forspekar for the merchantis
requirit Reuerentlie as efferit the aldirman and balyeis
that thai suld' nocht licence nay vnfremen' to saile nor
Suffir nay freman to tak vnfremennis gudis vndir colour
to haue in vthir partis and tile Obserue and keip to thame the
louabill actis and Statutis maid' tharupon' according to Justice
Offering him in thar namez' to pay x li' gif thai did' in
the contrar' and Requirit the aldirman and balyeis to pay x li' gif
thar happinnit to licenc ony ane vnfreman to saile but the
avis' of the denys of gilde and of the Counsale of the
towne protestande for Remede of law gif thai did' ony
thing in the Contrar' herof vpone the quhilkis the
saide Androw askit at me sere johne Stirueling Instrument
witnes alexander Rede sere is Johne rede Androw chamer Androw colison'
Dauy les' chaplannis Johne Waus Androw nachtj and William scrimgeour

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
duodecimo die mensis Junij Anno quosupra

The saide day patrik chernside grantit that he was borgh'
to Johnne' arthoour for lvj s' the quhilkis the baillies chargit
him to pay within terme of lawe

Eodem die Alexander hay conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore thome
Waus prelocutore eiusdem po inisuta empcione petre lane quam Willelmus
Wormet in sua opcione habuit et emendabit ut iura volunt

Eodem die Alexander hay conuictus fuit per dictam assisam pro perturbio Willemi
Wormet in verbis et Idem Willelmus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Alexandri in
verbi sed leuito Et mocio huismodi perturbis comperta fuit in dicto Alexandro et quilibet
alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Willlemus Wormet quitus fuit per dictam assisa de vna tande
libro et de Iniusta Intromissione vnius Cingule sine yone aliis pro taxta
dicti Alexandri recepta

Eodem die assisa referebat emendam perturbiorum per Alexandrum hay factum
Willelmo Wormet ut Supra ad prepositum et Consilium

The saide day patry chernside was present in the court ande offerit
him redy with tua personbis to depone the aithe how mekile he
gat for the Skinnis optenit one be Johne Robertsone eftir the
tenor of the Act maide tharupone Obefor /

The saide day Johne annande procurator for Johne Robertsone
Offerit redy to Resaue and her' patry chernside depone and Suer'
the aithe with tua leile men' in his hande how mekile he gat for
the Skinnis optenit one him be the saide Johne Reobertsone eftir
the tenor of the ait maid' tharupone Obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiudem
xiiij die Junij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Robertus Walcar conucitus fuit per Confessionem lingue
sue pro perturbio Johannis low talyour Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Robert blinsel pait iiijor s' for the Amerciamentis that Alexander
hay was conuict' of in the court haldin the xij day of this Instant
of June Ande the saide Alexander Oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to pay to the saide Robert xxiiij s' and euire he committ
ony strubulance in tyme to Cum or doys ony wrang and beis
conuict tharof In presens of Walter Ogiluy of boyn' and sere Jhone
Stirueling' notar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die mensis Junij ano quo supra

The saide day Dauid mar yongar' Solemptlie protestit quhat
euire he hade done in the Selling of his Inlande to Alexander
King Sulde turne his ayris to nay preiudiie in tyme to Cum
nor yet to him Self

The saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais the last day of June
Instant to Richarde hile yongar to ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne
of retre that he aw to haue his obligacione of tu li' g' fra him producit thar
in Jugement sene he hede pait the saide ij li' g'

the saide day Jonhe Ratre allegit he had pait tua li' g' that richarde hile
yongar clamit him of and askit ane day to preiwe his pament Ande the balyeis
assignit him this day xv dais to preiwe his saide Allegeance

The saide day the balyeis with avis' of the court continevit the action' betuix Johne
annand' procurator for Johne robertsone and patry chernsid' Anent the aithe for the
pament of the Skinnis quhil monunday the xix day of June Instant in siclik
forme as it now standis in withou preiudice tile ony part

The saide day William rollande allegit that he hed tak of the chamer quhar' he duellis
of Dauid Colp and the balyeis Assignit to the siade William monunday the xxi day day of
June tile preiw his tak Ande the saide dauid offerit to the saide William the key of the
Inhall for siclik maile as lang marion' tuk it for Ande atour he taxt Ilkan day
v s' and j d' of taxt maile that the saide William Inhabit the saide chamer fra monunday
that next Cumis furtht

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde miles legittime citatus responsure plegio super ipsum per gilbertum
menyes porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab eo xxxv s' and vj d' Igitur precipitur Andrea nachtj
sergeando ad capiendum districtum ab eodem milite et eundem ad plegium dimitti Ipsius
hodie ad quindenam videlicet ad vltimum diem Junij Instans premunire tanquam quarto die huius
processus

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xixo die mensis Junij anno quo Supra

add.foreign: Alexander prat et dictus Johannes prat

div.p:
The saide day sere Johne prat chaplane of Sanct george and thomas
altaris of Abirdene grantit him pait be the handis of Alexander prat
of xiij s' et iiijor d' of annuell yerlie ilkan yer' als lang as he
Inhabit the Inlande of vmquhile Williame of buchane

p.del: Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in rpetorio eiusdem

div.p:
The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' malcom'
crag forspekar that Duncane crak hede nocht fulfillit the act of the court
buk ofb Obefor maid' betuix him and sere Androu Colisone Anent the
Inputting of the wairstall in the butht quhilkis the saide Duncan occupeit
onputting of the lok and pament of the maile as in the samyn mar' fullie
is contenit for the quhilkis the said' Duncan was in Amerciament of the court and
tile Assitht' the partj as law will et cetera Ande the balyeis chargit the said'
Duncan and alsua William scrimgeour officiar of the said' burghe at commavnde of
the balyeis chargit the sadie Duncane to fulfill the pountis contenit
in the saide act betuix this and to morne at None Ande thomas
leslie ane of the balyei grantit that he gert and causit put furtht the
burdis of the wairstall that he put in the saide butht

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' malcum crage
forspekar that canny edindeouche is feit seruande to Johne arthour'
quhile his barne be spanit

The saide day it was deliuirit be the saide assis' that Johne matlande
sal pay to sere Johne of Stirueling and robert gothtray / ane boll
of malt and demi boll of beir' quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to
pay within terme Of law and to fynde Souerte to the pament of the samyn
or he passit out of the tolbutht

Eodem die Johannes Coupar conuict' per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
Kintor prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio Robertj murray pynor Et Idem Robertus
conuict' per dictam assisam pro perturbio dicti Johannis et quilibet alteri ut
Jura volunt emendabit et cetera

head.add: annande chernside procurator for John Robertson

div.p:
The saide day patry chernside and Dauid mar yongar deponit the gret aithe that
the saide patry sale Schew and declar' the Some that he gat for the skinnis
optenit one him be Jonhne Robertsone Ande Robert Waus requirit be the
saide patry / as ane to depone with him saide he walde avis' with his aithe
quhil friday that nixt Cumis Ande the saide aithez' being maide the
balyeis ordanit the saide patry / to gif his Compt and bil of Rekning to the
saide Johne Robertsone as Johne of annande his procurator this day eftir
Novne Ande ordanit the saide patry to pay teh Some that he restis aving'
and giffis in his avne compt to the saide johne Robertsone or his procuratoris
within terme of law Ande atour the saide patry grantit and he mycht
get or recouer' ony mair' for the said' Skinnis thane he has gottin
p' he sal refunde it to the saide Johne and this Some the balyeis
chargit the saide Patry to pay within xv dais next hereftir as
merchand' suld do to merchand'

The saide day Jonhne annande procurator for Johne Robertsone Solemptlie protestit
that and he mycht preiwe ony mair' Some or gudis takin or to
be Recouirit for the skinnis optenit apon patry chernside or that
thai war sellit derrar' thane the saide patry has gevin thame in his
compt that he micht haue pament tharof According to Justice

The saide day it was ordanit and deliuirit be the warde of the court and
chargit be the balyeis eftir the deliuirance and oppinning of certane witnes
producit and Suorne that Williame rollande sal gif his bill of his
expens' compt and rekning maide apone the lande that he now Inhabitis
to Dauy Colp and thai sal cheis' Suorne auditouris to her' se ande
vndirstande the saide Comptis betuix this and friday Ande gif it be fundin
that the Costis and expensis maide be the saide William one the saide lande
be equale and Corespondis to the male of the saide hous' and excedis nocht
he sal deuoid' and rede the samyn And' gif the Costis and expensis excedis
the male bigane the said' Williame sale Remane with the saide hous'
vnto the tyme the saide Costis and expens' be Runnyne corespon
deing to the maile of the saide hous'

head.add: Anent the making of burges and fremen'

div.p:
The xxj day of June the yer' forsaide It was statut and ordanit
be he denis of the gilde ande the Counsale that nay burges be
maid' of thir that Salis to Danskin within fiwe markis vsuale
money of Scotland'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eisudem vicesimo secundo
die mensis Junij anno quosupra

The saide day Johnne buk in monymusk was in amerciament of the court
be his avin tonge grant fo the dispersonynge of gilbert prestone sergeand'
And the said gilbert accusit be the baillies for the stroublance of the saide
Johnne was maid quyt of ale strublance of of the said Johnne be ane
suorne assis' Alexander Red forspekar Ande for the offens done the said
Johnne' the assis' ordanit him to pay ij li' of wax to the haly blud lycht

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo tercio
die mensis unij anno quosupra

The said day Johnne philp Kay grantit him feit prentys' ande seruande
to Johne Red hatmakar for thre yeris tocum ande Reman and do him
trew seruice quhile the said thre yeris be Runnyne

The saide day Dauid menyes gilbert ser Johnne' stirueling master Androu
craufurde and thomas Waus was Chosin betuix Dauid colp one that ane part
and Williame Rollande one that vthir part auditouris to heir considir ande deliuir
apone the costis and expens' maid be the said Williame apone the hous that
he occupijs pertenyng to the said Dauide Ande gif furtht thar deliuerance
betuix this and mononday And gif the said Auditouris takis nocht this mater
apone thame and deliuiris nocht betuix htis and mononday than the saide partiis sall
cum befor the ballies one mononday that next cumis and vnderly the deliuirance
of vthir Auditouris Ande the said Williame sal bringe his previs the said
day and preive sufficiently the costis that he has maid apone the said hous

Eodem die thomas philp constituit fecit Constituit creauit and nominauit thomam
Waus et Sponsam suam constituentes coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores actores
factores ac nuncios speciales dantes et Concedentes eisdem ac eorum alteri suam potestatem
ac mandatum speciale pro se et Nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Johanne
Crage Septem lib' et x s' et de receptis acquitadum Et si necesse
fuerit dictum Johannem et alios quoscumque pro se quandam Agendum defendendum et cetera Ac in omnibus aliis causis
actionibus et querelis ipsum concernens aut eidem spectare valens promittens de Rato grato Cum ceteris
clausulis necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die murdaicus sclatar fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem annande burgensis
dicti burgi suum legittimum ac Indubitatum procuratorem ad petendum et recipiendum ab Andreas Walcar'
Junioris in ythe vnam peciam lane sibi debito et inde quietclamand' Et si necesse
fuerit eundem andream Coram quocumque Judice competens pro dicta petra lane ac pro dampnis'
et expens' prosequendum Agendum defendendum promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis et terminis necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma ut supra

The saide day Dauy Colp In presence of the court askit at Androw nachtj officiar'
gif he hed' warnit thome Ridall and cristiane lilburne his Spous' and William
Rollande to Comper the said' day to heir' him sett taxt maile one thame
for the hous' that thai Inhabitis pertening to him as totor' to the ayr of vmquhile
William buchan quhilk officiar' presenit his warning Ande thar comper the
said' cristiane Ande the saide Dauy taxt v s' and ane d' Ilkan day of male
one the saide thome Ridale and his wif and vthir v s' and j d' one the said' Williame
that thai Occupeit ony of the landis pertening to him as tutor' forsaide but tak
of him
